definitions.definition: An object or other creation (e.g. narrative work) from which all later copies and variations are derived
A person with a unique and interesting personality and/or creative talent
Relating to the origin or beginning; preceding all others
definitions.example: the original state of mankind;  the original laws of a country;  the original inventor of a process

definitions.definition: First in a series or copies/versions
definitions.example: The original manuscript contained spelling errors which were fixed in later versions.
Tonight we will hear an original work by one of our best composers.
The paper contains a number of original ideas about color perception.
Parker was one of the original bebop players.
This kind of barbecue is original to North Carolina.
